description:
These toe covers provide the warmth and weather protection you want for those less-than-ideal weather rides.

  • 3-layer AmFIB® softshell material is wind- and water-resistant
  • Bottom opening sized for any three-bolt cleat
  • Simple elastic strap under the arch for a secure fit and easy on and off
  • Reflective elements keep you visible on low-light rides
name: Pearl Izumi AMFIB Toe Cover - Unisex
